mapper.select: select event_title, event_start, event_end from event

select * from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(event pk_event) */ rownum rn, event_no, event_title, event_info, event_start, event_end, event_image from event where
event_no > 0 and rownum > 0 and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into event(event_no, event_title, event_info, event_start, event_end, event_image) values (seq_event.nextval, #{event_title}, #{event_info}, to_date(#{event_start},'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{event_end},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{event_image})
mapper.update: update event set event_title = #{event_title}, event_info = #{event_info}, event_start = #{event_start}, event_end = #{event_end}, event_image = #{event_image} where event_no = #{event_no}
mapper.select: select count(event_no) from event where event_no > 0
mapper.insert: insert into holiday(holiday_title, holiday_start, holiday_end) values (#{holiday_title}, to_date(#{holiday_start},'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{holiday_end},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
